text: A couple in #Arizona took #chloroquine as a preventive measure against #coronavirus.  Now the 68 y/o man is dead, his 61 y/o wife is in the ICU. She spoke to @VaughnHillyard and said they took chloroquine after seeing #DonaldTrump on tv claiming the med was safe. #covid_19 https://t.co/7BRgrJ6e79
